snippet: The Yankees came to terms with Brett Gardner and four others, but should the team sign Masahiro Tanaka, the Japanese pitching star, it could trigger the payroll luxury tax.
abstract: New York Yankees settle all of their arbitration-eligible cases and sign five new players, inching closer to payroll threshold.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees came to terms with Brett Gardner and four others, but should the team sign Masahiro Tanaka, the Japanese pitching star, it could trigger the payroll luxury tax.

headline.main: Yankees Sign Five Players, Flirting With Payroll Threshold
